thread.section_title: Vision Direct UK Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of visiondirect.co.uk
thread.title: Haley
thread.title_full: Vision Direct UK reviewed by Haley

author: Haley
title: Haley
text: I have ordered from vision direct for over a year now and couldnt be anymore pleased! Only issue i had on this last order was my contacts was not recieved within the 5-6 day time frame (to usa) like they have in the past. So I noified the customer care team via email, which are professional and friendly, and were of great help. also very quick to respond and offer free shipping on my next order. And if i dont recieve it within next few days they did not hesitate to offer further compensation on my part! So yes i would definatley recommend vision direct to anyone looking to buy lenses/glasses online at great prices with helpful friendly service. thanks vision direct!
